signature: Collection<O> union(Iterable<? extends O> a, Iterable<? extends O> b)

enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before performing union operations on collections.

enhanced_by.method_name: intersection(Iterable<? extends O>, Iterable<? extends O>)
enhanced_by.reason: Both union and intersection methods involve combining collections and can be used to construct assertions for each other.
